segments.text: Hi , Sam . I want to buy a pet . Do you have any ideas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You really should go to Rachel's pet store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's more than special . You can find as many kinds of animals as you can put a name to and more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? are there any snakes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Snakes ? there are even rodents and monkeys ! it's a world of exotic pets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's terrific . I can't wait to check it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hang on . are you sure you want to keep a non-traditional pet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it will pose a risk to your health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mean , most reptiles carry some harmful bacteria , they are likely to cause immune system problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't believe it's a good choice to keep those pets , especially for families with young children .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I should have thought of my brother's baby girl . Maybe I'll just have a dog instead of an exotic pet .
segments.speaker: S1
